thread.section_title: Raffaello Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel, great location
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel, great location - Review of Raffaello Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Montylar
title: Lovely hotel, great location
text:
Hotel Raffaello was a lovely, a short walk from Termini Station and easy to find.
We received a friendly welcome. The room was very clean and suited our requirements. Breakfast was great. Danielo the concierge was on hand every day to help advise and arrange daily itineraries.
The location of the hotel was perfect for exploring Rome. I have been to Rome 3 times before and this is my favourite hotel so far. Excellent value for money. A wonderful experience again.
